newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle not fully established - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle not fully established - USDA.

text.p: Live Sales Compared to Wednesday - Slaughter steers and heifers not tested, USDA said. Trade was slow. Demand and seller interest light.
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 no sales.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 no sales.
Carcass Basis (weight only) Compared to Wednesday - Slaughter steers and heifers not fully established.

Steers - Select and Choice 2-4 1200-1275 lbs few 110.00-111.00 Holstein - (weight only) Select and Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs 104.00-105.00. Holsteins - ( grade and weight) Choice 2-3 1250-1450 lbs no sales Select 2-3 1250-1450 lbs no sales.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 no sales.
For the week - 27,000 Wk ago - 37,500 Yr ago - 49,100 Steers and heifers - Live basis - firm to mostly 50 higher.
Wk to Date - 25,000 Week Ago - 37,500 Year Ago - 49,100
